title: Deadly Denial
description: In this Dateline classic, when Raven Abaroa comes home to find his wife stabbed to death, detectives began digging into the couple’s complicated past. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on April 25, 2014.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
